column4: One of the nicest pizzas I have ever eaten! Had the selection for ‚Ç¨9.50 so was able to sample a few different flavours. Very very reasonable price, especially considering the proximity to the Vatican!

column3: Absolutely gorgeous pizza close to St. Peter‚Äôs
column4: Absolutely gorgeous pizza really close to St. Peter‚Äôs (3 minute walk). They recommended the 6 slices of different types and each one was nicer than the last! Highly recommend, really friendly staff too.

Brilliant experience. Easily the best pizza experience we had in Rome with interesting toppings on their 'live' menu, but the base here is the real treat. The staff are very friendly and accomodating staff for dietary requirements.
I highly recommed this eatery to anyone travel to Rome! The Roman pizza is excellent as is the service and the wonderful attitude of the staff! When I am in Rome I always go there for lunch!
The owner is so friendly, pizza is excellent, they have normal prices. View of the Vatican as you eat.
Its a simple lovely place, with great pizza and amazing staff (or owner, not sure). A true gem near Vatican. You must vome here, I ever find yourself in the eastern side of Tiber.
Superb. Fresh. Good value. Tasty. Varied. What‚Äôs not to like? With so many rip off merchants out there, we were happy to have found thus place.
We had a late lunch there and the pizza mix-plate (8,95‚Ç¨/person) was excelent. Food was delicious Roman style pizza and the service very friendly.
Tasty pizza, nice music and good staff. I ate a lot of different pizza and my belly felt great. Toilett is clean.
The Pizza was so good. Lots of varieties and you can order a sampler type plate. Very reasonably priced too. Would recommend.
Very nice variety of pizza. Great place for a quick bite. The guys are also funny and kind. Definitely recommended.
Great pizza with a great variety choice, quick and friendly service, I'll be gladly visit again. Recommended!
Best pizza i have ever munched, my mouth exploded with flavour. Staff were friendly and welcoming, less than ‚Ç¨5 for the food pictured. DELICIOUS.

column3: The best pizza I have ever tasted
column4: Friendly staff, awesome tasty fresh pizza! Probably one of the best places in Rome, totally recommend :)
Everything was fabulous! Everything was fabulous from the moment we arrived...our meal was memorable and the service was exceptional. Date of visit: January 2020
We were tired and hungry and Zizza had great and different flavors of pizza and very friendly people!
The best arrabiata in Rome. Near Vatican city. Small tables outside for the smokers. I will visit again.

We were looking for a quick pizza place next to our hotel and we find this place. Owner came out to greet us and talked to us. we ordered 4 pizzas to go and they amazing. And the price was very reasonable too.

column3: You can eat in the street
column4: If you want to take advantage about your time in Italy and you want to eat good and faster! Probably this is a good option...its cheaper and easy to eat while you are on a square or seeing something. Enjoy it!

column3: Oh my God, it is just amazing
column4: The best pizza I've ever had, plain and simple. The service is outstanding too. Stop by and give yourself the opportunity to try the pesto pizza.

Great pizza‚Äôs!! Nice guys know how to prepare proper pizza‚Äôs. It‚Äôs not a fancy place to sit but that didn‚Äôt bother us. We were hungry and needed some quality pizza‚Äôs. This is the place to go.

We read the 5* reviews of this place before going and weren‚Äôt disappointed. Ask for them to provide you with a selection to get a taste of their different pizzas. The tiramisu was as good as what we had anywhere.
My favorite pizza in Rome! We had the sampler platter and it was outstanding... The flavors and the crust were great. The service was fun and personal. A ‚Äú must try‚Äù when in Rome!
Plate for two includes six different pizza slices. Two slices each. It was a one of the best pizza meals ever!
We had the pizza sampler for lunch along with some beer. The food was good, service was friendly. Near the Vatican.

The pizza doesn‚Äôt really have a taste but you should not expect much from such am establishment. Its cheap so you basically get what you pay fore. The customer service of the staff adds a lot to the business of the place.

I wonder how such a touristic, narrow and on the side of the road pizzeria had so many positive reviews! We tried to enjoy some pizza there, due to the positive reviews.. however no!! Not a place to be.

After a long walk to the Vatican, we decided to eat pizza here through Tripadvisor ... and thankfully we went The employee are very friendly, perfect !! The food ... divine, the pizzas were very good Highly recommend and I will come back for sure

We had the vegetarian pizza platter for two. It was brilliant. Loved it, but we're too full to order anything else. If there's two of u, maybe order the platter for one. This'll allow unto have dessert also :) Again, loved the pizza
Friendly and helpful staff! The pizzas are just great, was here with my daughter and we took the mixed pizza plate. Fresh and delicious

column3: Had to wait to be seated
column4: Popular place, we had to que for 5 minutes...opted for standard plate for 2...selection of different pizza...was tasty

column3: Great pizza great guys friendly atmosphere
column4: Really enjoyed their food, their charming way of dealing with people. Lovely place that I would recommend to anyone near the Vatican.
Had the plate for 2. 7 types of pizza. It was really good. Close to Vatican. We would eat again. No menu. Trust the server
Very nice service. Good pieces of pizza, especially with pesto and egg plant and parmezan. Too little tables, though.
Wow what a Amazing place to have delicious pizzas and this place will surely not disappoint you in terms of food quality
We taste plate of all kinds of pizza. Delicious and kind stuff üñ§üëçüèª Tasty red wine, and desert üòäüòç
Mixed Pizza plate is a must. Great waiters. Proof that Italy is mother land of pizza. Good red wine.
The best pizza I have ever had, great staff and lovely atmosphere! If you are after a quick lunch, or an afternoon snack then this place cannot be missed!
Great people with great energy. Their pizza is a must try! I‚Äôll be back tomorrow! And probably the day after

Wow! Greeted with enthusiasm and courtesy. Then it got better. Wait staff was fun. The pizza sampler was a no brainer. We tasted multiple types of pizza and loved them all. Close walk from Vatican City. A must if you want fast, good food.

Don't miss this place, you will regret it! The best Pizza in Rome!!! We were with friends, all 4 of us were full with drinks and everything we paid just 60 euros. The place is budget of everyone and the has the tastiest pizza ever!
This restaurant is near the vatican and the pizza here is to die for. Also, it is very clean and the customer service is excellent
Very good pizza, nice hosts, nice atmosphere, next to the Vatican, It is not for nothing why it is a very popular place.
The pizza here is absolutely delicious. The tiramisu is also amazing. Staff are very friendly. Will definately return when we are next in Rome.
The one with Pesto souce is perfect. If you come to vatican, you should eat here... If you want to pizza, you should come here

We visited here for lunch after we did the Vatican and weren‚Äôt disappointed. The mixed pizza plate is great and it‚Äôs the only option on the menu which we loved as you got to try several different flavours. Staff were awesome and really friendly too.
Great place to sit down and enjoy great food after a tour of the Vatican. Tasting plate is the perfect way to try all kinds of tasty pizzas! Highly recommend.
The pizza was delicious! No menu really but we got the ‚Äúsample our pizzas for ‚Ç¨9‚Äù and all that we sampled were very good.
A nice place where you can try a variety of different pizzas. Friendly staff, nice food, a place not to miss.
Truly an amazing Italian experience! Great wine, great beer and non-pretentious... it‚Äôs all about the food here. Even the locals agree! We were surrounded by Italians
We found this place on this app and because of the very high ratings we decided to visit you. Excellent service, friendly waiters, very tasty pizza.
One of the best pizzas in Italy! They give you samples of different types of pizza and they are all delicious! Great customer service too!

We went here due to the very positive reviews and it didn‚Äôt disappoint, we had the sharing platter and it was so nice, it was nice to try lots of different types of pizza. The staff were also very friendly and accommodating.
Staff was great, very polite. But the pizza was not as good as we expected. It had too much salt and oil for us. However we liked the fact that we could try from a variety of different pizzas.
Best Pizza in Rome Italy great for the family a lot of choices quality pizza.Fun and Nice staff visit
The best pizza and good service! The price meets the value of the food. Highly recomended place in Rome. Near to the Vaticano.
I have thousands of pizzas in my life. This was one hundred percent by far the best. I would recommend getting the dish with all the different types of pizza.
The best place to try Italian pizza, the staff is very nice, well worth the visit. Come back again later!

Service that‚Äôs actually friendly from people who care about what they do. They don‚Äôt make you feel like stupid tourist to rip off. And most importantly the food is actually delicious! The pizza is crunchy and the toppings aren‚Äôt too salty or cheesy.
The best and most friendly in the area. Both English and Spanish speakers that helped out. Try the eggplant pizza, simply the best
The board with small slices of all the different pizza was amazing. Want some now :) Welcoming and atmosphere was really friendly. Really good pizza!

This small pizzeria is a find, only 5min walk from St Peters Square the waiters are very friendly and the pizza platter is gorgeous. But you can customize to suit your tastes. A must for dinner if your in Rome.

column3: good text in roma not like milan
column4: its good test in rome to eat pizza,i loved it but not similar test in milan. but the staff service was very helpful , i loved to come agin to take the test in rome and really appriciate
I don't understand the hype with the current TripAdvisor rating. Pizza is mediocre at best and the service was mehhh. Much better quality and cheaper pizza places spread throughout Rome. Avoid.
Went for lunch my wife and 2 kids. Very busy but squeezed us in. Friendly staff. Great pizzas! Highly recommended.
Very nice place, friendly staff and fast serving. Would recommend compared to nearby big pizzerias for quick and tasty meal.

Simply the best pizza i ever ate in my whole life, without any doubt! Travelled 2 weeks all around italy and nothing compares to it... zizza brothers are the best!! Thank you so much for the experience and hope to visit again soon.
5 stars! The best pizza i ever ate and they are very kind! The place to go to eat the pizza of your life! üòéüòéüòéüòéüòéüòéüòé
Great for a quick bite. Close to the Vatican, reasonable prices, service is really quick and pizzas are tasty. Staff were extremely friendly and hilarious, by far the best service we had in Rome!
This was for sure an amazing experience. The pizza was great and the service was great. I‚Äôve never tasted better pizzas!
The pizza is decent. The service is efficient but the place is very touristy. You won‚Äôt see any locals.

Unbelievable service, food, vibe and effeciency! I was cautious seeing a place rated 5***** thinking nah its fake... Let me tell GO! Let Julian just bring it on... You won't be disappointed... Guaranteed!!!
Nice food! A lot of options! Fantastic customer service! Will definitely come back to this shop and eat it! Pizza No.1
Best host, best pizza, best atmosphere for a very good price. No thoughts on what to order, just go for the pizza mix and enjoy!
Small place, but so fun and the pizza was so good! Our whole family had more than enough between us, and the staff were endlessly lively and friendly.

We bombarded them with a group of 10 and they happily accommodated. They suggested their platter which was fabulous! We were looking for authentic Italian pizza and found it. They could not have been more friendly or attentive.
Very close to the Vatican City and not expensive. Very fresh ingrediants, the toppings were good and many to choises.
The pizza was truly amazing. I loved the service. The people were friendly and helpful when ordering. And if you‚Äôre lucky you may see a waiter playing with some of the birds around the street.

column3: Great Puzza place and friendly staff
column4: Pizzas come in small pieces depending on your choice. Very reasonable price. Great location and very friendly staff.
We stayed near Pizza Zizza and stopped by just about every day. The pizza is awesome and easy to grab on your way home or you can sit down and eat as well. I highly recommend.

Very delicious Resonable price Kind staff Good location Total score is üèÖüèÖüèÖüèÖüèÖ I stongly recommend this pizza :-) ÌïúÍµ≠Ïù∏Îì§ Î≥ÑÎ°úÏóÜÎäî ÌòÑÏßÄ ÎßõÏßë Í∞ôÏäµÎãàÎã§~„Öã„Öã Î∞îÌã∞Ïπ∏ Í∑ºÏ≤òÏóê ÏúÑÏπòÌï¥ÏÑú Ï†ëÍ∑ºÏÑ±ÎèÑ Ï¢ãÏäµÎãàÎã§ Ïò§Ï†Ñ Î∞îÌã∞Ïπ∏ÏãúÌã∞ Íµ¨Í≤ΩÌõÑ ÌóàÍ∏∞Î•º Îã¨ÎûòÎ≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïöî
Location was nice. We got a sampler platter. Pizza was pretty good. Service was excellent. Staff was friendly.
Great location just right next to San Pietro, so after a long walk through museums of Vatican we could quickly sit and eat perfect pizza with great beer. Great service, no extra ‚Äòtable‚Äô costs.
Saw this place had 5 stars on trip advisor and it did not disappoint! We went right after a long morning at the Vatican. The pizza is amazing and there is a great variety. The service was also great!
Great Pizza and vegan Food. If you like Rum, ask for the vegan dessert :) Very nice service guy. Very tasty at all.

Loved it! We stopped there after a visit to the Vatican. The service was friendly and fun and the pizza is out of this world! We had the sampler platter for two and we were also offered their amazing suppli!! A fantastic little place!!

This restaurant was recommended and they said it was the best pizza in Rome. We were skeptical. It was SO good. We ordered a sampler. We all loved it. The service was great and we would go back in a minute.

Wow. We‚Äôre from NYC so we know pizza. The pizza was excellent, as was the service. The waiter spoke Italian, English and Spanish, which is just impressive as an aside. Got the pizza sampler and red beer and it was a delight.
Pizza was good but it was the service I will remember here! It was fun to be here for lunch! Thanks guys!
You are welcomed into your seat after you a tour of all the options available. It‚Äôs busy ‚Äî yet, you can have your pizza fairly quickly! Go for it if you are in the area.
No menu, just a fun variety of pizza and fun host and awesome tiramisu and pan cotta! Near the Vatican

column3: Amazing pizza, fast great loving service
column4: First thing, you can see the guys there love their job. Welcoming, laughing, great service. You caj choose a big tray with tastings for 9 euro a person or choose yourself amd oay by weight. Crisp dough, great tastes. Loved it

column3: Great place to unwind and refuel after exploring the Vatican
column4: It's a short walk from St. Peter's and well worth it! The guys here were so friendly and the pizza sampler was so good!!! Their pizza was light and sooooo soooo good!! The little rice balls were delish too!!
Me and my partner visited this area yesterday and had to visit this place after hearing about it on TV. The pizza was great and if I return will definitely be coming back again!
After our visit in the Vatican we planned to check this nice pizza place and we are really pleased with it. The staff is extremely friendly, and their pizza is delicious. Highly recommended!
Stayed in Rome for 4 days and visited the pizza place twice! Pizza is super tasty, staff are super friendly and passionate. Tiramisu is INSANE! Must visit!!!
I came here with a couple of friends and the waiters here were awsome and the pizza was great. I tasted all the variety of pizza and you can't make a bad choice.
The staff is very friendly and the food is amazing. Pesto Pizza is really good. Try the mixed plate if you are a group of 4 or 2
1 st time at Zizza but definitely not the last ü§£ amazing pizza,tiramisu the staff is welcoming, great atmosphere!!!
Few tables but excellent pizza!!!!! We chose combined pieces to try different flavours and they all were great!! Close to the Vatican with very helpful, pleasant staff!!!
A tiny little place, very close to the Vatican. Friendly staff if you are lucky to get a table, and they have a wonderful tasting menu where you get to try a variety if different pizzas.
Super pizza a servis je top!!! we love it.. we sure came next time .. service was best.. Thank you ..
This is one of the most happening place in itali ...... the staff is also great, as is the atmosphere. The food is willy nice. Highly recommend a visit for an anffordable and quality meal!!!!
Very very good pizza, typical thin pizza dough.... you can eat inside but it's small place. For takeaway it's best idea. A few type of pizza. Price for quality = very good.....
Best place in rome i find them really friendly and lovely people I have never eat such a pizza buona

It‚Äôs a very little place, with little but unusual proposal of pizzas. You can take a mix to try the best suggestions. It‚Äôs really good. Not standard tastes. And don‚Äôt forget tiramisu.. it‚Äôs amazing )))
Had the sample board with 8 different types of pizza on, each type was really tasty and would recommend having this. Staff are very friendly!
Best pizza in Rome!! Everyone must come here and try it!! The service is great for this caind of pizzaria!! 5* from Hiquain!!!!

Probably the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had in my life. The staff was great and made the whole experience that much better. The sampler pizza was a great choice because we got to try a little of everything. I recommend this place to everyone.

Would highly recommend this restaurant. We came across this after the Vatican tour and the pizza was so amazing. The staff are so friendly and gave great recommendations as to what to get. Pizza was incredible.
Small restaurant really close to Vatican. Staff was spreading great energy and food was delicious. I really recommend visiting this place.

column3: The best pizza in the world üòÉ
column4: The best pizza in Rome and probably in the world. They offer several pizza types. When you come, they put a plate in front of you with all types of pizza for you to try. Soooo perfect.
If you see this place from outside you would never go inside! And that would be a big mistake! Amazing pizza and very friendly service!!! You have to wait for a table but it worth to wait.

column3: Great snack close to the Vatican
column4: After the long walk through the Vatican and St Peters Cathedral we stopped here for a bite to eat. We ordered the mixed boards to share and were delighted with the different selections and delicious flavours.
Excellent pizzas, not much space to eat inside though, 6 chairs. More space outside. Really good pizzas though and super friendly

column3: Ok pizza not what i have expected
column4: We have seen so many reviews saying wow pizza but taste was ok... but it could be more plus their is not much choice sadly.

column3: Enjoy with mixed pizza and good service.
column4: No menu. Just sit and listen. Mixed pizza seem to be the easy choice and you will enjoy with 7 kind of pizza. Tiramisu is also good. The shop is small and we need to wait in queue but not so long, worth to wait.
One of the best pizza I have ever had. Delicious. Small pizzeria but great food and friendly service. Expect to queue a bit... it's totally worth it.
We found this place on TripAdvisor. It was busy and none of the neighboring places had an customers. It didn‚Äôt disappoint. We ordered the sampler for two. Good food and good value!
Go there! 10 minutes walk from vatican city. AMAZING pizza, great service. Went after the museum and before san pietro bazilicaüëç

column3: Is it the food? Is it the people? Or both?
column4: Small place with satisfying variety of pizza. I surely recommend pizza with buffalo. Perfect tastes and lovely people ready to fullfil your will.
Very good Pizza and good service. It is a very small Restaurant, but what you need more, when the most important things are the best?
We walked nearly 2km just to try their pizza. Haha we ordered a variety of flavors to get a taste of everything. Wasn't disappointed. The boys were very attentive. Would recomend
Very good pizza! Tasty, fast and perfect service! So if you want to eat quickly and continue sightseeing-that‚Äôs the best place!
The food was great and Mr. Jacopo was even better! We had so much fun with the waiter - he could work as a TV host or comedian. We recommend it!
The menu was the staff who actually recommended everything! Service was fast and accurate. Food was very good. And it was a short walk from the Vatican right after our tour.

We had a quick lunch before visiting Vatican which is at 5 minutes walking. The owner proposed us a mix pizze plate. Delicious. Very friendly staff. It deserves a visit when you are in the neighborhood.
We loved the place the service and pizza of course!! Very small traditional place where you go to eat the best pizza with a nice prosecco!! No wifi no modern details just food!!
Had to wait for one of their very few tables, but was well worth it. Get the pizza sampler- six different variety slices and all are outstanding. Rice balls excellent too.
The food is incredible everywhere you go in this area but you've never had pizza until you eat it here. Wonderful people, wonderful food and great atmosphere.

column3: Go right after you finish the Vatican tour
column4: After 3-4 hours in Vatican museum and church, we were desperate for having a cold beer and some pizza. Bingo! The right place with great pizza pieces and very friendly staff. You might be queuing cause there is only few tables but it‚Äôs worth it.
We were 7 hungry persons and we waited like 15minutes because the place is small and it was full, but totally worth it! Fabulous pizza and perfect service! Very close to the Vatican.
The best pizza ever and service is just perfect! Place is very small, but with great vibe and an amazing food.
The pizza buffet lunch from here was magnificent and great value for money. Only problem was having to wait half an hour outside for a table, however we did have a snack whilst waiting.
Best pizza, what a find! Close to Vatican city a must try. Owner was very nice, rounded down the cost for us. Cheap and delicious!
Very good. Fine pizza. Nice price. Good for vegetarians as well. :3B-):3O:-)(^_-):O:3:3:O:3:OO:-)(^_-):-\(^_-)B-)(-:B-)(-:B-)(-:B-)B-)B-)(^_-)B-)
Would highly recommend. Near the Vatican. Tasting platter of pizzas was great. Really friendly staff.
Great sampler dish and service just down from St Peter's Square. Left feeling so full and content! Worth the short wait!
One of nicest pizza restaurants in Rome. Friendly service! Cool beer! Highly recommend to friends and will come back next time. Many thanks !

column3: Good food and coffee, nice service
column4: The place is located only 100 m from St. Peter Basilica. You can be served a plate with a variaty of pizzas. Don't worry if you can't finish - you can take away.
They suggested the mixed plate to sample different pizza types and it was delicious! Service was very good, staff were friendly

This establishment is ideally suited outside the St. Peter‚Äôs basilica and Vatican City. Perfect to grab a quick bite of heavens foods, slices and slices of different pizzas waiting to satisfy you. Would highly recommend
Popped in here for a quick bite. Plenty of seating outside, great in fine weather. Nice range of cuisine. Reasonable prices too.
Dozens of pizzas on display and you pay by slice and seriously the pizzas are as good as the reviews.
The pizza sampler order was great plenty of different flavours, the staff was very friendly and funny. Please don‚Äôt leave without trying the homemade Tiramisu u will regret it üòâ
I‚Äôm writing this review with one hand because I don‚Äôt want to stop eating this pizza. Get the sharing platter. Eat all of it and even if your brain tells you to stop. Die happy
So many varieties to choose from by the slice & weight. Easy way to enjoy one of Italy's favorite foods.
Amazing food. Took veg platter . Reasonable place. Friendly staff. Beer is great . Near Vatican this is the best .
Worth the visit! Best pizza we ate in Rome! The waiter is nice and very welcome! Just go.. don't miss it.
Where else would you get an amuse Bouche, waiting for your Pizza? And the Pizza were from another world. Very delicious, innovative flavors and an outstanding service, very untypical for Rome.
This place was our first place after landing in Rome. We are vegetarian and went with the staffs recommendation on pizza platter, it was excellent. Great staff and service.
Very expencive, beer (red) 1 litre 12‚Ç¨, small 0.4l 6‚Ç¨, pizza (different tastes 2 of each) for 2 people 17,5‚Ç¨. Friendly service.
It's a delicious pizza and various kinds for everyone to fall in love with üòçüòçüòç Kind staff and cold beer üçªüçªüçª

Had a super tea time meal of approximately 6-8 pizza squares each. Beautifully cooked and our waiter was multilingual and great chat. Highly recommended and so close to the Vatican after a long day... fabulous.
fantastic pizza so many varieties of tastes to please everyone. we'll be back soon maybe next year !! Wendy and family
The staff was friendly! Many flavors of pizza can choose. And you can ask them for the size you prefer...the price base on the weight....and really Not expensive in this area!
if you are looking for the best pizza in the world then this is your place to go . amazing dought and very crispy !!

If you're visiting Rome, you have to eat at Pizza Zizza! My boyfriend and I shared the plate of different pizza slices. It was delicious and not expensive. The service was great, people who work there create an awesome atmosphere.
small cafe however the food and waiter service/personality was huge! there was a short wait but worth it for sure. its thicker crust pizza. the shrimp one was my favorite. family of 6, 2 children.
Excellent pizza, fantastic service. Small pizzeria near Vatican with amazing pizza menu and very good service.

column3: Incredible food and service, plus very cheap
column4: We visited based on excellent reviews and we're certainly not disappointed. Incredible good, extremely friendly service and very reasonable (‚Ç¨28 for the shared pizza board pictured, a beer and an apperol spritz) Highly recommend

column3: Great pizza, so far the best in Rome!
column4: What a great place for pizza, very small place but excellent service, did not require service fee but totally deserve one!
a nice place to take away pizza and many varieties of pizza .i have been to rome more than 10 times and each time i go a try something else .another favor of pizza..absolutely delicious.
A nice and cozy small place next to the Vatican. The pizza is absolutely amazing, some og the best I‚Äôve ever tasted. A place to be recommended for sure.
+ Really good Pizza + nice Dessert + good Service Could be that you have to wait a little bit, but it‚Äôs worth it
One of the best place to kill appetite...very very fresh and friendly atmosphere. Tastes just awesome and very very fresh. Do not forget to order tiramisu.
We loved this place. We came here 3 times for our breakfast/lunch. Best Pizza in Rome. Get the sharing platter where you can get a bit of everything. You will not regret it!!
After a long day at the Vatican this was the perfect play to refuel with pizza and wine. Pizza was spectacular and the atmosphere was genuine. The pesto pizza had so much flavor! Simply delicious.
Good, but Not the best pizza. There should be better places than here. But love the waiter‚Äôs personality and service! Worth visiting.

Wow what a find, great pizza with very good friendly service. Pizza Zizza is very, very good value. And even better food. One thing, it‚Äôs small so be prepared to que. Not a criticism just a fact, well worth the wait!

We found this restaurant online and are glad we gave it a try. We got there right at 12 and were seated right away - fortunate since it‚Äôs a very small restaurant. Waiters/owners were great. We ordered the pizza sampler and loved it.
I love this pizza and this small place. The people is friendly and very cute.. I want another piece of pizza because it's a very good üòã

Great service and great pizzas! We ordered almost everything on the menu and everything was amazing. They have anchovies pizza as well that wasn‚Äôt on display and it‚Äôs a must have if you love anchovies.
Very nice sample of Italian pizzas with different variety mozzarella, prochuto... at a nice terrace facing the Vatican . Price was reasonable and waiter friendly.
I can‚Äôt rate this high enough! We had visited several pizza places across Italy and this was by far the best I have ever had and the service was excellent!
The food was amazing. Beautiful to look at and delicious to eat! The pizza and rice balls (not sure of their actual name) we‚Äôre so very good! Everything was fresh and tasty! Highly recommend!
Amazing drinks, amazing pizza, amazing dessert, amazing service! Just truly worth coming to. Cheap too!!
This pizza place is really good and the pizza is amazing. We took plate for 2 with 6 different pizzas and each of them was just excellent.
It is just a perfection!! Must visit. I had three meals in a row and I cant decide what is the best.

column3: Delicious! Worth the Wait! Pizza and Sangria!
column4: Pizza Zizza has an excellent selection of pizzas, but my family ordered the sampler which was suggested by the waiter. Great idea! Everything was wonderful, and I was

This place had the best pizza. We ordered the different variety of pizzas. The portion size was more than enough for the three of us. We even had left overs to take home. Highly recommend and also had great service!
Very good selection board. The pizza was the best I had in Rome. I recommend it to everyone you should try this place delicious pizza....
